name: Gullkin
movement: walk 20 ft., fly 30 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Gullkin is a medium humanoid creature with avian and aquatic traits, known for its agility and the ability to fly and swim.
memorable: This creature can control the battlefield with its Tempest Breath, pushing enemies away.
goals: The Gullkin seeks to maneuver in combat, using its environment to its advantage.
relations: May be encountered alongside aquatic or avian creatures.
environment: Found in coastal areas or near bodies of water.
strengths: High dexterity allows for agility and effective ranged attacks.
weaknesses: Low armor class and hit points make it vulnerable in prolonged combat.
attacks: The Gullkin attacks with its beak or javelin, dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Tempest Breath allows the Gullkin to push enemies away, disrupting their formations.
skills: The Gullkin has a perception skill score of +1, providing an average ability to detect hidden threats.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for 15 minutes, enhancing its adaptability underwater.
Effective in close encounters due to its melee and ranged attack versatility.
Uses agility to navigate between flying and swimming.
Ability to control battlefield flow with Tempest Breath.
Appears as a blend of bird and fish-like features.
test_queries: creature that can fly and swim
humanoid with avian and aquatic traits
medium creature with Tempest Breath ability
